title: Targeting
text:
This page shows how advertisers allocate their budgets across different targeting methods. Higher percentages indicate methods that receive more advertising investment.
Key targeting categories include:

Custom Audiences: Targeting based on advertiser‚Äôs own data
Lookalike Audiences: Finding users similar to existing audiences
Detailed Targeting: Interest and behavior-based targeting
Geographic: Location-based targeting at various levels
Demographics: Age, gender, and other demographic attributes

title: Interests
text:
This page reveals which interests, behaviors, and audience segments advertisers target most heavily. These targeting options allow campaigns to reach specific voter segments based on their online activity and preferences.
Use the search box below to find specific interests or behaviors.

title: Spending
section: Comprehensive Analysis of Digital Political Advertising
text:
Comprehensive Analysis of Digital Political Advertising
This dashboard provides an in-depth analysis of political advertising spending and targeting strategies in Netherlands. Explore how advertisers invest their budgets across different demographics, locations, and interest groups.

üéØ Key Insights Available

Top Advertisers: See who‚Äôs spending the most on political ads
Targeting Methods: Understand how budgets are allocated across targeting strategies
Demographics: Explore age and gender targeting patterns
Geographic Focus: Discover which locations receive the most ad spend
Interest Targeting: See what behaviors and interests are being targeted



üí° How to Use This Dashboard
Hover over any chart element to see detailed tooltips with spending amounts, percentages, rankings, and contextual information. Use the navigation tabs above to explore different aspects of the advertising data.
Data from: December 17, 2025 ‚Ä¢ Spending in USD
